item.description:
February 22, 2012

ArtsWorcester’s Aurora Gallery

7pm-9pm

Peer critique night at ArtsWorcester:

Members are invited to bring one piece of in progress, or recently completed visual artwork to be presented for feedback. This is a peer critique night amongst the members who register for this event. The group will be moderated by Donna Dufault to insure everyone gets an equal chance to present their work. When presenting the work the artist should be prepared to offer information on the inspiration, technical process, intention of the piece and the area they are looking for feedback on. The group will be asked to offer feedback that describes, analyzes and interprets the work with a focus on constructive criticism. We encourage works in progress for the upcoming exhibition T-Minus: Worcester to the Moon.

All categories of visual art can be presented; artists are responsible for transporting works to and from the gallery. 

This event is free for members; $10.00 non members of Arts Worcester. Please consider joining Arts Worcester and have the opportunity to show your work in the gallery. See their membership page for info: http://www.artsworcester.org/membership

An easel and pedestal will be available to display the artwork.

RSVP by Feb. 17, 2012 508-755-5142 or cynthia@artsworcester.org
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting in the upstairs Gallery

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Peer critique night at ArtsWorcester
